Room.Name: Myrr Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling east-west on Myrr Lane, north of the Great Observatory.
Room.LongDescription: A very large but ruined building stands on the north side of the lane. Kista is a city devoted to research and the advancement of knowledge, but the Institute of Investigations into Ball Lightning simply ran a particular experiment with too little safeguards. Part of the building was destroyed, but you see there were several left intact.
